short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Guess the Pokemon from the black image!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Test your Pokémon knowledge with "Guess It - G". This fun and interactive Chrome extension challenges you to identify Pokémon based on their silhouette. Guess the Pokémon by typing its name and see if you're right! Track your progress by viewing the list of Pokémon you've correctly identified.
